DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - To compare single-dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) intranasal administration 20 mg OPTINOSE SUMATRIPTAN 20 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Nasal Spray , 100 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Oral Tablet , 6 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Subcutaneous Injection , healthy subject . - To estimate relative bioavailability single-dose intranasal administration 20 mg OPTINOSE SUMATRIPTAN , 20 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Nasal Spray , 100 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Oral Tablet compare single-dose 6 mg IMITREX® ( sumatriptan ) Subcutaneous Injection , healthy subject .
